description: The call follows an investigation into Stu Peters' comments over the Black Lives Matter protests.
title: Manx Radio 'must make changes' after Stu Peters investigation
title_page: Manx Radio 'must make changes' after Stu Peters investigation - BBC News
maintext: The commission said the comments made by Mr Peters could be considered "insensitive" but there was no evidence that they had been done to "stir up racial hatred".
